summary: ALL FOUR ROTORS FAILED BEFORE THE BRAKE PADS FAILED.  THE DEALER SAYS THIS IS NORMAL WEAR AND TEAR.  HOWEVER THE VEHICLE HAS BEEN LIGHTLY USED.  IT SEEMS THE BRAKE ROTORS ARE MADE OF DEFECTIVE MATERIALS SUBJECT TO ABNORMAL CORROSION.  FORD CUSTOMER SERVICE REFUSED TO COVER THE PARTS UNDER WARRANTY.  THIS IS A SAFETY ISSUE THAT I WILL HAVE TO RESOLVE AND PAY FOR.
